content.description: Start on a nice hueco jug and make a difficult move rightwards into a layback crack.  From here the difficulty eases the higher you go.  Fun starting moves, but the difficulty doesn't last long.
content.protection: Pads and Spotter.  The other side of the corridor is just behind so don't fall or spot carefully.
content.location: The furthest route inside Mammary Lane.  Starts and a good hueco next to "ZTF" graffiti.

content.description: Simply follow the huecos up. The holds are huge making this a fun and easy route for beginners.
content.location: Located near the "classic" Warm Up Boulder this area can be found by walking directly East (Towards the Ranger Station).

content.description: This small area is a subset of Warmup Area.  The most famous problem in this area is Une Pointe de Bleau dans Un Hueco V11 that is known more for it's difficulty than quality.  In addition to this there are a few mid-quality V3's and V4's along with one fun V0-.
